name: Cool Day
description:
!!ALL CITIZENS MUST HAVE A COOL DAY!!

ALL CITIZENS CAUGHT LOITERING WILL BE PUNISHED.

HIGH FIVE FELLOW CITIZENS TO GAIN SPEED AND POINTS AND HAVE A COOL DAY.

ALL CITIZENS MUST USE " A " AND " D " TO STEER.*

ALL CITIZENS MUST JUMP BY PRESSING " L " AND MUST BRAKE/DECELERATE WITH " ; ".

ALL CITIZENS MUST SWITCH HANDS WITH " ' ".

CITIZENS CAN FLY BY PRESSING " P " WHEN THEIR LIGHT TURNS BLUE.

*Okay, citizens can also use a controller if they want. It has been mapped to a PS4 controller so you can use X to jump, Square to brake and decelerate, Circle to switch hands and R1 to fly.

Music by Ben Robinson
